interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: facetheory FaceTheory Talc Free Loose Powder, Matte Translucent Powder, Absorbs Oil and Sets Makeup, Vegan and Cruelty-Free Pink POW 0
Review Date: 2023/01/05
Store: facetheory
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Facetheory', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Color': 'Pink, Lavender, White, Black', 'Finish Type': 'Shine,Matte', 'Coverage': 'Light', 'Item model number': 'POW'}
Review Text: I just tried this today....it's absolutely beautiful! I love the ease of blending, the sheerness, and the perfection it gives to my skin without being cakey, shiny or irritating. Being mature skinned I like a matte look, but not sparkly or falsely dewy. I also love the fact that it's buildable and it hides flaws, texture, but noncomodogenic. Definitely will buy again!
Review Title: Fabulous!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

3D Microcurrent Face Massager Roller Electric Rechargeable Face Lift Beauty Roller Face Body Massage Tightening Lifting for Anti Aging Wrinkles
Augoog
{'Brand': 'Augoog', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Included Components': 'Face Massager', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 4.75 x 1.95 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Testo-1', 'UPC': '728458420705'}
Just received it and tried it today. 1. The manufacturer didn't tell consumers in the instruction leaflet that the charging cord is a phone cord, needing to be hooked up via an adapter! 2. It works extremely quietly, in fact, were it not for the indicator lights, you'd think it wasn't working! 3. The "charge" feels very prickly..almost like a mild stinging sensation. It takes getting used to. I'll keep it up maybe once/day for a few...see what happens! My review may change...we'll see.
We'll see!

The decals are nice but when they're placed onto the nail, it doesn't lay flush to the nail, which means they eventually "buckle" and  raise even with nail lacquer applied over top! You can only wear them...at best, about 2 days before you get problems with buckling!

actual_interaction.text: I just tried this today....it's absolutely beautiful! I love the ease of blending, the sheerness, and the perfection it gives to my skin without being cakey, shiny or irritating. Being mature skinned I like a matte look, but not sparkly or falsely dewy. I also love the fact that it's buildable and it hides flaws, texture, but noncomodogenic. Definitely will buy again!
